## Upcoming workshop

### Working with Sentinel 1 satellite data with Craig O'Neill

**Who**: Associate Professor Craig O'Neill, QUT

**When**: Tuesday Sept 3, 3-5pm hybrid

**Where**: QUT Gardens Point Campus R block room 301 OR on TEAMS (link sent through listserv)

**Description**:

We are lucky to have QUT Associate Professor [Craig O'Neill](https://www.qut.edu.au/about/our-people/academic-profiles/craig.oneill) show us how to obtain, process, and plot corrected Sentinel 1 satellite data using the European Space Agency's [SNAP](https://earth.esa.int/eogateway/tools/snap) toolbox.

**Requirements:**

Download SNAP -- see instructions [here](https://step.esa.int/main/download/snap-download/).

A recent version of [QGIS](https://qgis.org/download/), recommend the long term release.
